summary: The module defines a wrapper that combines multiple ControlNet models into a single interface, allowing a diffusion UNet to receive several conditioning inputs simultaneously. It manages the collective loading, saving, and forward execution of the grouped ControlNet instances, presenting them as one cohesive model.
business_intent: Facilitate advanced AI image generation pipelines by providing a unified multi‑conditioning mechanism for diffusion models, improving flexibility and scalability for developers integrating multiple control signals.
